title: Date Histogram Facet

name.description: Specifies the name of the aggregation

aggregation_type.description: Specifies the type of the aggregation

attribute.description: Specifies the full attribute name to aggregate on

interval.description: Size of the intervals into which a given set of values is divided

min_interval_population.description: Minimum number of items in the bin required for the bin to be returned.

description: This aggregation dynamically builds fixed size (a.k.a. interval) buckets over the values. Can only be used with date values
